revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (4), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (4)

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== [[Apple HomePod (A1639)]] - Manuf. P/N MQHW2B/A :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/BCG-A1639 BCG-A1639] (2018-01-19)
*{{WPLink|Apple HomePod}} {{see also|Amazon Echo Devices}}
{{FCC ST|07/17/2018|indexme.}}
==Links of Interest== ===Teardown=== *[http://techinsights.com/about-techinsights/overview/blog/apple-homepod-teardown/ ''Apple HomePod Teardown'' on '''TechInsights'''] *[https://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/HomePod+Teardown/103133 ''Teardown - Apple HomePod (A1639)'' on '''iFixit'''] <!-- :Apple A8 APL1011 SoC (Apple iPhone 6) - PoP RAM LPDDR4 :SK hynix H9CKNNNBKTCUSR1GB - RAM LPDDR4 SDRAM :Toshiba THGBX4G7D2LLDYC - 16GB (128Gb) NAND Flash or :SK hynix H2JTDG8UD1CMR - 16GB (128Gb) E2NAND3.0 NAND Flash :USI 339S00450 - WiFi/Bluetooth Module (Broadcom BCM43572) ::(iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone X phones - BCM4361 ?) ::(iPhone 8/8 Plus - USI 339S00397 Wi-Fi/BT 5.0 - Broadcom BCM4361) ::(Galaxy S8 - Broadcom BCM4361, CC2640R2F, WCN3990, Dialog DA14586) :Apple/Dialog 338S00100-AZ - PMIC, DC/DC Texas Instruments TPS62130, TPS54560 ::(Apple/Dialog PMIC 338S1251 used in the iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus) :Texas Instruments TLC5971 - LED Driver (x5) :Cypress CY8C4245 LQI-483 - Programmable SoC (touch control) :STMicroelectronics STM32L051C8T7 - Ultra-low Power ARM Cortex-M0 MCU :International Rectifier PowlRaudio 98-0431 - Class-D Audio Amplifier ::(IR (Infineon) Powlraudio IR43xx (IR4311 35W 4Ohm) :Analog Devices SSM35158 - Class-D Audio Amplifiers (x7) ::SSM3515 - Class-D Amplifier (8.4W RMS 8Ohm 107dB 1% THD) :Conexant (Synaptics) CX20810 - ADC Voice IC :MEMS Knowles microphones (x6) :4350C Y01742 TWN Audio? -->
==Notes== ===Specifications=== *Apple A8 processor *Wi-Fi AC with MIMO and BT 5.0 *4″ upward-firing woofer *Beamforming seven-tweeter array *Beamforming six-microphone array *Low-frequency microphone for :real-time woofer calibration *Top-mounted touch interface
